title: House for Sale in Kotte
details:
Fully Tiled two story house on Obahena Road, off Pita Kotte-Thalawatugoda Road is for sale.

House is situated on a 8.25 perch land and access to the property is through a 13 feet no through road.

Once you enter to the Land you will come to the Garden with a well and parking space for two vehicles and access had been kept to have a garage constructed.

House had been built 10 years back and have the following features,

On Ground Level
Large Living Area
Dinning Area
Separate Kitchen with Pantry Cupboards
Bedroom with Attached bathroom

1st Floor
TV Lounge
Master Bedroom with Attached Bathroom with Hot Water
Common Bedroom
Front Balcony which is accessible through common room or TV lounge

Also Roof top can be accessed with a stairway and rooftop had been laid with grass layer and also with a sitting area to enjoy the stunning view of the city and surrounding areas.

All rooms are equipped with large wall cupboards, Back Garden with Servent Toilet, Waterproofing had been done to the rooftop area.

Following locations can be easily access from the property

Kibulawala Walking Path
Sri Jayawardanapura General Hospital and Hemas Hospital
Thalawatugoda and Pita Kotte Junctions
Nugegoda Town
Battaramulla

Further easy access to all amenities.

If you are looking for a place close to the city with affordable living this will be the best choice. Please contact VIN Properties to arrange an inspection.
